Interesting blog entries will be posted here!

In Progress

After implementing some core functionalities, I now spend most of my time cleaning up. Tests have to be written. Improvements have to be made.

Regarding new features:
I recently added some basic editor UI. I will add some images soon.
I also want more lights, not just the image-based environment, but before adding this there is a lot of work to do. The ECS and the scenes as a whole need to be improved.
